Cyan Dungeon.name: Cyan Dungeon
Cyan Dungeon.description: Deep below the ground lies an abandoned mineshaft, stained with secrets long forgotten. For what is a greater folly of man than the sin of greed?

Darkest Depths.name: Darkest Depths
Darkest Depths.description: Far, far below the waves lies a disturbance, a tear into our world. What possibly could have caused this?

The Fallen Forum.name: The Fallen Forum
The Fallen Forum.description: Having passed through the time itself in the ruins of the Congress, the Fallen Forum awaits.

City of Shifting Waters.name: City of Shifting Waters
City of Shifting Waters.description: Deep below Steelmeld, sealed away by its unknown former inhabitants, lies secrets long since forgotten.

Gray Dungeon.name: Gray Dungeon
Gray Dungeon.description: What would force a kingdom to lock off their capital? Al Malakut awaits its rediscovery.

Alchemy Labs Dungeon.name: Alchemy Labs Dungeon
Alchemy Labs Dungeon.description: Ahead lies the Alchemy Labs, bandits, and their cache of explosives.

Light Blue Dungeon.name: Light Blue Dungeon
Light Blue Dungeon.description: There must be secrets hiding within this ancient place.

Light Gray Dungeon.name: Light Gray Dungeon
Light Gray Dungeon.description: Hidden within a citadel; hidden within a mirror. Alutana's palace stands strong.

Lime Dungeon.name: Lime Dungeon
Lime Dungeon.description: Before you stands an empire lost to time, independent of Ishnir and Chillwind. What secrets from the distant past lie within?

Magenta Dungeon.name: Magenta Dungeon
Magenta Dungeon.description: From the depths, you can feel a sickness pouring. What lies below?

Orange Dungeon.name: Orange Dungeon
Orange Dungeon.description: You discovered a lost outpost of the Tlaxans, hiding more than just loot...

Pink Dungeon.name: Pink Dungeon
Pink Dungeon.description: Seasons bend and twist rapidly here. Deep in this dungeon lies a dark secret, do you dare seek it out?

Purple Dungeon.name: Purple Dungeon
Purple Dungeon.description: Below the mythical island of Corsair's Claw, the legendary pirate Varcosa awaits you.

The Black Willows.name: The Black Willows
The Black Willows.description: A lost grove stretches before you, filled with riches.

Malevolent Reverie.name: Malevolent Reverie
Malevolent Reverie.description: One man's dream is the Narsens' nightmare.

Ephemeral Corridors Dungeon.name: Ephemeral Corridors Dungeon
Ephemeral Corridors Dungeon.description: You find a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

Echoes of Oblivion.name: Echoes of Oblivion
Echoes of Oblivion.description: Having passed through the Sacrarium of Aeons, a strange place lost to time now sits before you.

White Dungeon.name: White Dungeon
White Dungeon.description: Before you lies the ancient sacrificial temple to a lost god...

Yellow Dungeon.name: Yellow Dungeon
Yellow Dungeon.description: The seasons rage before you, a curse on the Sons of the Forest. Can you overcome them?
